title: Laging with normal ping and fps
body: So I have normal ping (45-50) and fps (100) and I feel like playing with 300 ping or worse. I think it is because of packet loses, here is link: http://logsoflag.com/#m10H9e-9DIF   But how can I fix it?

replies.body: Thanks for the screenshot for context!  Packet loss like this can be due to a network issue or how your ISP is rounting to the game server.  I suggest starting out with our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide which will provide a series of troubleshooting steps and most likely to fix this up for you.  Let me know if you still have any issues.
